title: Nee illa Thooram Lyrics Kadhal Kan Kattudhe
stanzas:
<div>
<div>
Nee illa Thooram Lyrics Kadhal Kan Kattudhe

Nee illa thooram
mattum vendaam.
ninaithaalum solla
mudiyaathe.

ennodu vanthaal
mattum podhum
verondrum ketka
theriyaathe

vegu thooram
pogum megamellaam
en mele thooral podaathe

manathodu pesum
vaarthai ellaam
orunaalum unnai
seraathe.

Nee illa thooram
mattum vendaam.
ninaithaalum solla
mudiyaathe.

ennodu vanthaal
mattum podhum
verondrum ketka
theriyaathe

Kaayam edhaiyum
en kadhal sumakkum.
thanimai mattum
ennodu irukkum

kaalam muzhuthum
en kadhal irukkum
kannodu irukkum.

ne ponapin kannaadi
nadikkum
naan yaarendu
sollaamal irukkum

indha vali mattum
eppodhum ennul
thavikkum.

Nee illa thooram

ninaithaalum solla
mudiyaathe.

seraathe.
